bibl.title: The Role of Foreigners in Ancient Egypt. A Study of Non-stereotypical Artistic Representations. (BAR International Series. 1426.)
bibl.note: A study of the role of the foreign immigrants in Egyptian society from the second millennium BC to the Ptolemaic period. - 1. Ethnicity. - 2. Stereotypical imagery. - 3. Asiatics. - 4. Syrians. - 5. Libyans. - 6. Nubians. - 7. Minoans. - 8. Indians. - 9. Conclusion. - Cited works.
bibl.seg: BOOTH Charlotte, The Role of Foreigners in Ancient Egypt. A Study of Non-stereotypical Artistic Representations. (BAR International Series. 1426.)
